nodes.bodyText: @guozhangwang we should also reset the partitionTime for the RecordQueues in #clear?
clear is also called in suspend in which we should not clear the partitionTime, but I think we should reset the partitionTime in close.

Sorry for the late comment as the PR is already merbe, but if we don't clean the partitionQueues, why would we need to reset streamTime or partitionTime ? I we keep all records in the buffer all know times stay valid, don't they?
Similar to resetting partitionTime, we should also reset streamTime in PartitionsGroup#clear() below though?
Opened a minor PR: #8250 (let me know what you think)
